title: Rito Tour
body:
Can I get some info on this please? I really want to come take a tour of the place the next time I'm in town. 

How long is the tour? 

Do we get to meet Marc and Brandon? 

I heard you get a bunch of RP too...

replies.body: The site was recently updated with a calendar with tour schedules and the sign up process.  Check it out [here](http://www.riotgames.com/tours)!  I don't have any additional details to offer about the tour itself, but I hope that helps get you started!
Is it true you get free RP?
I don't think so, atleast it's not something I've heard about!  The tour is intended to explore riot culture and not necessarily hand out free stuff.
